overview: After a good, hard workout, Tristan Brazer and Rikk York decide to rinse down in the shower, but when they find it empty, Tristan looks for a little post-workout play. It’s not every day that Chandler finds himself fucking a stranger at the gym, but it’s not every day that he runs across a stranger with such a fuckable ass as Mike. title: Damn Fine Ass!
